title: Message to the Convention of the American Institute of Steel Construction.
text:
My dear Mr. Abbott:

I will be obliged if you will express my cordial greetings to the convention of the steel construction industry called by the American Institute of Steel Construction at Pinehurst on October 28th. All efforts looking toward the forward march in business and employment deserve wholehearted commendation and support. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Charles F. Abbott, Executive Director, American Institute of Steel Construction, Inc., 200 Madison Avenue, New York City ]
